directions: Place bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, and onion in the bowl of a food processor; puree until smooth.  Stir together 4 teaspoons of this puree with the mayonnaise, and vinegar in a small bowl.  Season with pepper, garlic powder, and cumin.  Cover, and refrigerate for at least 3 hours to allow flavors to develop.
ingredients: 1/4 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
title: Baja Sauce
